result.eng: The abandoned soldier continued fighting until the end.
result.ga: Lean an saighdiúir tréigthe ag troid go dtí an deireadh
result.orig: Lean an saighdiúir tréigthe ag troid go dtí an deireadh
result.html: Lean an saighdiúir tréigthe ag troid go dtí an deireadhThe abandoned soldier continued fighting until the end.
result.ponchtml: Lean an saiġdiúir tréigṫe ag troid go dtí an deireaḋThe abandoned soldier continued fighting until the end.

result.eng: There was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.
result.ga: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnóna
result.orig: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnóna
result.html: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnónaThere was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aġaiḋ go dtí an teaċ táḃairne um ṫráṫnónaThere was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.

result.eng: The course will be continued in the next semester.
result.ga: Leanfar den chúrsa sa chéad seimeastar eile
result.orig: Leanfar den chúrsa sa chéad seimeastar eile
result.html: Leanfar den chúrsa sa chéad seimeastar eileThe course will be continued in the next semester.
result.ponchtml: Leanfar den ċúrsa sa ċéad seimeastar eileThe course will be continued in the next semester.

result.ga: Lean siad ar aghaidh ag spiaireacht

result.html: Lean siad ar aghaidh ag spiaireachtThey continued spying.
result.ponchtml: Lean siad ar aġaiḋ ag spiaireaċtThey continued spying.
